Interface UserIndex<U>

  • Type Parameters:
    U - type of the users
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FastPreferenceData<U,I,V>, FastRecommender<U,I>, FastUserIndex<U>, PreferenceData<U,I,O>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFastPreferenceData, AbstractFastRecommender, CachedUserNeighborhood, ConcatPreferenceData, Factorization, FastRankingRecommender, InvertedUserNeighborhood, ItemNeighborhoodRecommender, MFRecommender, PopularityRecommender, RandomRecommender, RerankingRecommender, SetCosineUserSimilarity, SetJaccardUserSimilarity, SimpleFastPreferenceData, SimpleFastUserIndex, SimplePreferenceData, ThresholdUserNeighborhood, TopKUserNeighborhood, TransposedPreferenceData, UserNeighborhood, UserNeighborhoodRecommender, UserSimilarity, VectorCosineUserSimilarity, VectorJaccardUserSimilarity

    public interface UserIndex<U>
    Index for a set of users.

        boolean containsUser(U u)
        Checks whether the index contains a user.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Counts the number of indexed users.
        Returns:
